DOC.brief_summary: The objective is to determine if data from the National Insurance Health card (giving antibiotics and hospitalizations in the past 18 months) allow to predict the individual risk of antibiotic resistance and to identify population groups for which probabilistic antibiotics regimen of urinary tract infection could be simplified
DOC.brief_title: Does the National Health Insurance Card Allow us to Predict Antibiotic Resistance?
DOC.criteria: national health insurance card available community acquired urinary tract infection incapacity to accept an inform consent hospitalized acquired urinary tract infection national health insurance card non available
